directions: Melt 2 teaspoons butter in a skillet over medium heat; add the eggs. Allow the egg whites to cook until mostly firm before breaking the yolks; continue cooking until eggs are completely cooked and no longer runny, 2 to 3 minutes.
Spread one side of toasted sourdough bread slice with Dijon mustard.
Arrange avocado slice onto the mustard.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or more to taste
title: Perfect Breakfast
